docs.snippet: The Pakistan military plans to search with helicopters Saturday morning for a pair of well-known Utah climbers missing on an icy mountain peak that has been encased by thick clouds and snowfall for days....

docs.snippet: NFL fans turned out in force on Twitter on Friday to heap scorn on Colin Kaepernick and two other players who refused to stand during the playing of the U.S. national anthem in a second week of pre-game protests, but some fellow players offered su...

docs.snippet: The company’s chief executive said in an interview with an Irish broadcaster that the European Union’s tax decision was “maddening” and politically motivated....
docs.lead_paragraph: The company’s chief executive said in an interview with an Irish broadcaster that the European Union’s tax decision was “maddening” and politically motivated.
docs.abstract: Apple chief exec Timothy Cook defends firm's tax practices in interview with Irish broadcaster RTE; Margrethe Vestager, competition commissioner for European Union, says recent decision ordering Ireland to collect $14.5 billion from Apple for unpaid taxes was based on laws preventing members from favorably treating certain companies; American officials are against ruling because it hampers their efforts to collect taxes on tech giant's $215 billion stockpile of overseas cash.

headline.main: Tim Cook, Apple Chief, Defends Tax Practices and Says Cash Will Return to U.S.
headline.print_headline: Apple Chief Angrily Defends Tax Practices Against a ‘Wrongheaded’ Ruling

docs.snippet: The quarterback’s refusal to stand during the playing of “The Star-Spangled Banner” raises the issue. A musicologist says no....
docs.lead_paragraph: The quarterback’s refusal to stand during the playing of “The Star-Spangled Banner” raises the issue. A musicologist says no.
docs.abstract: Edited excerpts from interview with musicologist Mark Clague, who weighs in on question of whether American national anthem is inherently racist in light of San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick's refusal to stand when song is played before football games.

headline.main: Is the National Anthem Racist? Beyond the Debate Over Colin Kaepernick
headline.print_headline: Beyond the Red Glare of Debate, Is the National Anthem Racist?

docs.snippet: After years of deflecting pressure to build a roof that would prevent the almost inevitable rain delays, the tournament is dealing with unforeseen noise issues at Arthur Ashe Stadium....
docs.lead_paragraph: After years of deflecting pressure to build a roof that would prevent the almost inevitable rain delays, the tournament is dealing with unforeseen noise issues at Arthur Ashe Stadium.
docs.abstract: Retractable roof added to Arthur Ashe Stadium, home to United States Open tennis tournament, has created acoustic problems; sounds made by fans reverberates off roof and disrupts play.

headline.main: U.S. Open Quieted Those Calling for a Roof. Now It Faces a Louder Problem.
headline.print_headline: They Built a Roof. It Got Loud. Now What?

byline.original: By DAVID WALDSTEIN and BEN ROTHENBERG
